page.title: 18A Mum's Day
page.content: Awoke at 7.30a.m.& managed to get out of bed by 8 o'clock. Would have preferred it to be 9 o'clock at least. Should not have stayed up until after midnight. Gave children their cereals & toast for breakfast which they consume with relish even if they are not fully awake for the first few chews. Husband has toast and black coffee for his breakfast prepared totally oblivious to the presence of others. My breakfast is porridge and a cup of tea, two cups if I have time.Not today though,I have to go to work. Run for the bus as usual but need not have bothered since the bus I usually catch did not arrive.Next one arrives ten minutes later so get to work a little late. Work in a shoe shop in Blackburn.My arrival home usually coincides with the children's return from school,but not today!
